name: Tartaros (Leonard Gombos)
description:
You play as a Persephone a greek godes that has been abducted by Hades, escape the underworld.

Solve puzzles and riddles, have fun!

hints: 

*shoot spells on trunks of trees and bushes to make them change state

*small chains are shootable (dont destroy the crates)

*a statue like nose can be a smoke detector

*pressure plates open doors

*you can jump on leaves

-find 3 ingredients  and a lab to mix a potion to defeat cerberus guarding the exit

RMB - hold to prepare spell

LMB - shoot magic

WASD - move

SPACE - jump

E - interact, hold objects

MMB -throw
